summary.Title: Cook/kitchen staff, Krøderen, Norway
summary.Presentation: Krøderen Kro og Motell AS, Krøderen, Norway, is looking for a cook / kitchen staff.Job tasks:Á la carteFood productionPrepare cold and hot dishes

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Krøderen Kro og Motell AS, Krøderen, Norway, is looking for a cook / kitchen staff.

Job tasks:
  • Á la carte
  • Food production
  • Prepare cold and hot dishes
  • General cleaning
  • Knowledge of Norwegian food culture, or the desire to learn, is preferred


Language:
  • Norwegian, Scandinavian or English.


We are looking for someone who can handle a hectic workday, is efficient, and can take initiative and responsibility. It is important that you are willing to learn and familiarize yourself with the tasks. You must be able to work independently and collaborate well in a team. Some experience is an advantage.

You must be able to work from around May 1st/June to October or November (due to paternity leave).

Working hours:
  • daytime and evening, every day, shifts


Salary:
  • by agreement


Other information:
  • Good working environment
  • We can assist with accommodation. This is 5 km from the café, so you need to have a car and driver license.
  • You are a EU/EFTA citizen, or you have a valid work permit in Norway


More information:

Hege, Office Manager, +47 3214 7877, hege@kroderenkro.no

How to apply?

Send CV and application letter to: hege@kroderenkro.no as soon as possible, latest by 28th February 2025.

Only serious applicants with right qualifications and language will be answered. Please read the work description properly.





The café Krøderen Kro is idyllically located by the Krøderfjord, near Norefjell in Buskerud County. Popular roadside café with accommodation and cafeteria, serving Norwegian traditional food as well as steak and hamburgers, etc. Many regular and occasional guests.

Please visit Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KroderenKroMotell

Occupation.Name: Kok
AlternateNames: Kok med speciale i bagværk og kager
